file_insights.description: Implementation of smart error constructors with auto-attached suggestions

patterns_discovered: Consistent error constructor naming (e.g., Config(), Configf(), ConfigWrap())
Categorized error types (Config, Backend, Agent, Command, etc.)
Error wrapping with original cause preservation
Quick constructors for common error scenarios
gotchas_discovered: Complex error handling might introduce cognitive overhead
Potential performance impact of auto-attaching suggestions
Requires a robust suggestion registry to be effective

approach_outcome.commit_message: auto-claude: 2.3 - Add smart error constructors with auto-attached suggestions

recommendations: Create comprehensive test coverage for all error constructor scenarios
Consider performance benchmarking of error constructors
Review and potentially standardize error code constants
Add detailed logging capabilities to error constructors
